HT&E has called in Macquarie Capitals bankers to test appetite in its investment in software vendor Soprano.
HT&E owns a 25 per cent stake in Soprano, which made $25.5 million EBITDA in FY20… [+316 chars]

articles.author: Dominic Powell
articles.title: Woolworths boss rules out fewer stores as digital sales boom - The Age
articles.description: The boss of Woolworths has no plans to stop opening new supermarkets across the country despite expectations visits to the retailer’s websites will soon outstrip those to its physical stores.
articles.content: Eighty per cent will be done in a store, packed into the boot of a car, he said. The shape of our stores will change, what our team do in-store will also change, but our stores will be relevant for a… [+3431 chars]
